import React from "react"; import { useForm } from "react-hook-form"; import { useQuery, useMutation } from "@apollo/client"; import { Button, Card, CardBody, CardHeader, Form, FormGroup, } from "reactstrap"; import { DIRECTOR_LIST, ADD_MOVIE } from "../queries/query"; const SideNav = () => { const { data } = useQuery(DIRECTOR_LIST); const { register, handleSubmit, watch, errors } = useForm(); const [addMovie] = useMutation(ADD_MOVIE); const onSubmit = (data) => console.log(data); return (
映画監督
映画作品
); }; export default SideNav;
